page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT PROSPECTS
page.content: The jobs offered in Porlock range from Building,Garage work,Hotel and Cafe work,sometimes Agriculture or may be a Bank or Post Office or Local Shop may have a vacancy.The majority of Porlock people who apply for jobs don't get them in the village but in the nearby town of Minehead,and often they have to move out of the area.Most of the jobs on offer in Porlock are jobs which don't need high qualifications or much training.Out of the eleven people from Porlock leaving school in 1984,four went into local jobs,six went into Further Education and only one is thought to be unemployed.
